name: Trash Bomber
description:
• Feeling Tired? •



Trash Bomber is a relaxing "hidden object" game, suitable for people of all ages!

• Gameplay •



You are tasked with overseeing the process of turning trash into ashes inside an incinerator. Due to poor sorting, each batch of garbage that's poured into this machine comes with objects that aren't allowed to be recycled in it. Your job is simple: find every object that can't be incinerated (represented by the icon in the middle of the screen) and blow them up!

• Endless Supply of Puzzles! •



Since there's no way to know what people will throw into their garbage bins, every heap of trash is randomly generated based on the chosen difficulty.

• Customize the Incinerator! •



The more piles of trash you successfully inspect and burn down, the more color palettes will be available for you to decorate the incinerator with!
